Package be.jsams.client.swing.component

Interface Summary
JsamsButtonsInterface Interface for the methods to implement OK, cancel and reset.
 

Class Summary
JsamsButton An extension of JButton with internationalization and icon.
JsamsButtonsPanel Custom JPanel with OK, Cancel and Reset buttons.
JsamsCloseableTabbedPane An extension of JTabbedPane with a closing button and a icon that represents the business.
JsamsComboBox Customized JComboBox for JSAMS.
JsamsDialog Customized JDialog.
JsamsFormattedTextField Customized JFormattedTextField.
JsamsFrame Generic JFrame with internalization, icon and native look and feel capabilities.
JsamsLabel An extension of JLabel with internationalization and icon.
JsamsMenu Menu with internationalization.
JsamsMenuItem Menu Item with internationalization.
JsamsPeriodField  
JsamsShortcutToolBar A customized JPanel to have some shortcuts to more used functions.
JsamsStatusBar JSAMS generic status bar, for all messages (warning, error and infos).
JsamsTable Specific JTable for JSAMS with auto resize capabilities when the call to setModel method.
JsamsTextField An extension of JTextField.
